alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Goodhue; Rice (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 7:48PM CST until December 15 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dakota County in east central Minnesota... Goodhue County in southeastern Minnesota... Northeastern Rice County in south central Minnesota... * Until 830 PM CST. * At 747 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Webster to Kenyon to near Dodge Center, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Wanamingo around 755 PM CST. Pine Island around 805 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Goodhue, Welch and Red Wing. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for south central, southeastern and east central Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for south central, southeastern and east central Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin.
